Legendary bird Pokemon. They say lightning causedby the flapping of its wings causes summer storms.
ZAPDOS is a legendary bird Pokemon that has the ability to control electricity. It usually lives in thunderclouds.The Pokemon gains power if it is stricken by lightning bolts.
